desc: Sams Teach Yourself Adobe GoLive in 24 Hours follows the series? usual structure of 24 one-hour lessons and seeks to make the content manageable for readers who are new to Web publishing with GoLive.The book teaches the reader how to use GoLive to do everything from designing a simple Web page, to plotting Web site navigation, to adding interactivity, to publishing and administering a completed site.
title: Sams Teach Yourself Adobe GoLive 6 in 24 Hours
